# MyInsta ğŸ“¸

A simple yet powerful Instagram clone that allows users to post images and videos, interact with others through likes and comments, and explore content shared by others. A fun and interactive way to stay connected and share media!

![demo](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

## Features âœ¨

- ğŸ“¸ **Post Images & Videos**: Upload your favorite media and share it with everyone.
- â¤ï¸ **Like Posts**: Show appreciation for others' content by liking their posts.
- ğŸ’¬ **Comment on Posts**: Engage in conversations and interact with the community.
- ğŸ‘€ **Explore Content**: View posts from different users around the world.
- ğŸ” **Simple Authentication**: Secure login and user accounts.

## Technologies Used ğŸ› ï¸

- **Frontend**: REACTJs, Tailwindcss, Redux
- **Database**: FIRESTORE
- **Authentication**: FIREBASE Auth
